Package server

package server
The server package contains all the java classes responsible for server logic, GUI and event handling.
  • Class Summary
    Class
    Description
    ClientHandler
    Contains the logic for communicating with the client over the objectinputstream and objectoutputstream.
    ServerController
    ServerController class for adding event listeners to the serverView and setting up the serverModel.
    ServerModel
    Contains the logic for creating the server socket and handling the chatlog.
    ServerView
    The ServerView displays the information that the server gets from the client.
